mapper.sql: id, menu_name, menu_level, create_date, update_date, menu_url, parent_menu_id, priority
mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.parent_menu_id,a.menu_name FROM menu a INNER JOIN menu_role_relation b on a.id=b.menu_id and b.del_flag=0 INNER JOIN role_info c on c.id=b.role_id and c.del_flag=0 WHERE b.role_id=#{roleId} and c.`status`=1 and a.del_flag=0 ORDER BY a.priority ASC

SELECT e.id,e.menu_name,e.menu_level,e.menu_url,e.parent_menu_id,e.priority FROM user_role_relation b INNER JOIN role_info c on c.id=b.role_id and c.del_flag=0 INNER JOIN menu_role_relation d on d.role_id=c.id and d.del_flag=0 INNER JOIN menu e on e.id=d.menu_id and e.del_flag=0 WHERE b.user_id=#{userId} and c.`status`='1' and b.del_flag=0 ORDER BY e.priority ASC
